content.body: I have discussed the status quo proposal to a tech community (IM). They found the opt-in fall through is missing and we've suggest a new simple addon

content.body: This syntax (the `|` after the whole pattern) opt-in the fall through, and does not have the foot-gun like fall-through in switch. It allows write RHS once with different structures & guards.
